SEARCH
Package com.dua3.utility.fx.web

Class WebViews

java.lang.Object
com.dua3.utility.fx.web.WebViews
public final class WebViews extends Object
The WebViews class provides utility methods for setting up WebEngine instances and handling events in JavaFX WebViews. It contains methods for setting alert, confirmation, and prompt handlers, as well as a logger for JavaScript log messages. Additionally, it provides a method for calling JavaScript methods on a JSObject and filtering events in a WebView.

    static class 
    WebViews.JSLogger
    The JSLogger class is a utility class for logging messages from JavaScript code.

  • Method Details

    • setupEngine

      public static void setupEngine(javafx.scene.web.WebEngine engine, String loggerName)
      Sets up the WebEngine with alert, confirmation, prompt handlers, and a logger.
      Parameters:
      engine - the WebEngine instance
      loggerName - the name of the logger to be used

    • setAlertHandler

      public static void setAlertHandler(javafx.scene.web.WebEngine engine)
      Sets the alert handler for the given WebEngine. The alert handler is responsible for displaying alert dialogs in response to JavaScript `alert` statements in the loaded web page.
      Parameters:
      engine - the WebEngine for which to set the alert handler
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if the engine is null

    • setConfirmationHandler

      public static void setConfirmationHandler(javafx.scene.web.WebEngine engine)
      Sets the confirmation handler for the given WebEngine.
      Parameters:
      engine - the WebEngine to set the confirmation handler for

    • setPromptHandler

      public static void setPromptHandler(javafx.scene.web.WebEngine engine)
      Sets the prompt handler for the given WebEngine. The prompt handler is responsible for handling prompt dialogs that may be triggered by JavaScript code running in the WebEngine.
      Parameters:
      engine - the WebEngine to set the prompt handler for

    • setLogger

      public static boolean setLogger(javafx.scene.web.WebEngine engine, org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger logger)
      Sets a logger for the provided WebEngine instance.
      Parameters:
      engine - the WebEngine instance for which to set the logger
      logger - the logger to be set
      Returns:
      true if the logger was set successfully, false otherwise

    • callMethod

      public static Object callMethod(JSObject object, String methodName, Object[] args)
      Calls a method on a JSObject with the specified arguments.
      Parameters:
      object - the JSObject on which the method will be called
      methodName - the name of the method to call
      args - the arguments to pass to the method
      Returns:
      the result of the method call
      Throws:
      JSException - if an exception occurs while calling the method

    • filterEvents

      public static void filterEvents(javafx.scene.web.WebView wv, Predicate<? super javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent> filterKey, Predicate<? super javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent> filterMouse)
      Set up an event filter for WebView.
      Parameters:
      wv - the WebView instance
      filterKey - the KeyEvent filter
      filterMouse - the MouseEvent filter
